content: the gippsland poncho © sandra levey 2025 this pattern was made specifically for myself so is shared here from rough notes taken during the knitting process it has not been tested the pattern is a combination of both written instruction and charts where the charts do not have a written component size made to suit a 100cm-120cm bust finished length 45cm yarn i used a combination of regia sock yarn and bendigo woollen mills athena both are fingering weight yarns and were held doubled throughout the project - occasionally doubled on themself but mostly one strand of each a total of 1200 metres was used if you substitute a single strand of heavier yarn such as dk or worsted you will require approximately half the meterage listed gauge i haven t measured as the pattern changes quite often needles 4 0mm circular needles in 40cm 60cm and 80cm as needed to accommodate stitch count notions one stitch marker cable needle section one only tapestry needle for weaving in ends skills required knit in the round work ssk decreases work k2tog decreases work yo increases sk2togp decreases kfb increases basic cable abbreviations sts - stitches k - knit p - purl m1 - make one stitch cn - cable needle psso - pass slipped stitch over sk2togp - slip one knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over kfb - knit into front & back of the same stitch 1 the gippsland poncho ©sandra levey 13 june 2025 pattern using the 40cm circular cast on 114 sts place a marker join in the round ensuring stitches are not twisted work a k3 p3 rib for 2cm knit 2 rounds increase as follows k9 m1 k19 m1 repeat brackets until last 10 sts k10 120sts work section one knit 4 rounds increase as follows k3 m1 k6 m1 repeat brackets until last 3 sts k3 140 sts work section two knit 4 rounds increase as follows k4 m1 k4 m1 repeat brackets until last 4 sts k4 174 sts 2 the gippsland poncho ©sandra levey 13 june 2025 work section three purl one round increase as follows k5 m1 k4 m1 repeat brackets until last 5 sts k5 216 sts rounds 1 & 3 purl rounds 2 & 4 knit work section four written only a total of 3 times round 1 p3 slip 1 purlwise with yarn at back k2 psso round 2 p3 k1 yo k1 rounds 3 & 4 knit purl one round increase as follows k4 m1 k9 m1 repeat brackets until last 5 sts k5 240 sts rounds 1 & 3 purl rounds 2 & 4 knit work section five purl one round increase as follows k2 m1 k5 m1 repeat brackets until last 3 sts k3 288 sts knit 4 rounds 3 the gippsland poncho ©sandra levey 13 june 2025 purl one round work section six purl one round knit 3 rounds purl one round rounds 1 3 & 5 k2 p2 rounds 2 & 4 p2
